channel.title: JMBCraft [PvP] [factions] [Raiding] [Greifing] [SuperNatural] [Economy]
channel.description:
JMBCraftHard CorePvP+Factions Server. IP: 86.168.131.33
- Features - SuperNatural: Special Classes to Help Single PvPing,Group PvPing. PvMing or just having fun. - Factions: Teams to Have as backup for raiding, PvPing and Socializing with Other Members. - PvP: Player vs Player Show them whose Boss! - Economy: Make your own Shops or sell and Buy items from the Admin Store to save you time! - PvP Arena: Want to settle a score? Challenge them to a 1v1 Fair fight in the Arena! - PvE Temple Raid: Made by one of the owners test your Reaction speed and Gear in this Extremely Hard Group or Single Event. - MobArena: Made By One of the Owners, see how long you can survive Against the Hordes of Monsters! - McMMO: Awesome Plugin that allows you to level up skills E.g Swords,Axes,Woodcutting and Acrobatics! all with there own unique Buffs! - Votifier Now Installed!- To Vote Go here! http://minestatus.net/35626-jmbcraft Upcoming features!
- 24/7 - bigger Maximum Players JMBStaff-
Host~ PuneyWhiteBoy Joint Owners~ PuneyWhiteBoy,Jontaaaay and BraandenJames Admins~ corky1926,mmaattyyllooll and INiinja Mods~OmgIm2Good At The Moment We are looking for more trustworthy Mods to Join our Staff-
JMBServer Forums-
For Updates, Info and Instant Help go to: http://www.jmbserver.enjin.com/ All registered Members will receive 1000.00 In game dollars!
For Further Info and Help Add Me On skype- Crunchy.monkey
I Hope to See you Soon!
~ PuneyWhiteBoy

item.title: JMBCraft [PvP] [factions] [Raiding] [Greifing] [SuperNatural] [Economy]
item.dc:creator: @WhiteBoyz WhiteBoyz
item.description:
@WhiteBoyz wrote:

JMBCraftHard CorePvP+Factions Server.
IP: 86.168.131.33

  • Features

  • SuperNatural: Special Classes to Help Single PvPing,Group PvPing. PvMing or just having fun.

  • Factions: Teams to Have as backup for raiding, PvPing and Socializing with Other Members.

  • PvP: Player vs Player Show them whose Boss!

  • Economy: Make your own Shops or sell and Buy items from the Admin Store to save you time!

  • PvP Arena: Want to settle a score? Challenge them to a 1v1 Fair fight in the Arena!

  • PvE Temple Raid: Made by one of the owners test your Reaction speed and Gear in this Extremely Hard Group or Single Event.

  • MobArena: Made By One of the Owners, see how long you can survive Against the Hordes of Monsters!

  • McMMO: Awesome Plugin that allows you to level up skills E.g Swords,Axes,Woodcutting and Acrobatics! all with there own unique Buffs!

  • Votifier Now Installed!- To Vote Go here! http://minestatus.net/35626-jmbcraft
    Upcoming features!

  • 24/7

  • bigger Maximum Players
    JMBStaff-

Host~ PuneyWhiteBoy
Joint Owners~ PuneyWhiteBoy,Jontaaaay and BraandenJames
Admins~ corky1926,mmaattyyllooll and INiinja
